titles.title: It's not by might, nor by power,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
It's not by might, nor by power,
But by My Spirit says the Lord of hosts;
It's not by might, nor by power,
But by My Spirit says the Lord.
This mountain shall be removed,
This mountain shall be removed,
This mountain shall be removed,
By My Spirit says the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Is there a mountain in your way,
Do doubts and fears alarm?
If so, you'll hear the Spirit say
"This mountain shall come down!"

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Is there a hurdle in your path,
A river deep and wide?
Stand still, the waters will rise up,
You'll reach the other side.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Is there a fiery-furnace trial,
Far more than you can bear?
Behold! the blessed Son of God
Is walking with you there.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Trust the Lord, the mighty God,
He'll speak the winds away;
Yea, though it seems you're in a storm,
For you, He'll make a way.
